mapper.select: select job_title, job_id, DATE_FORMAT(job_begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as jobBeginTime, CEILING((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(job_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(job_begin_time)) / 60 / 60 / 24) as time, course_name, (job_end_time < now()) as isEnded, (job_begin_time < now()) as isStarted from job, student_course, course where student_course.course_id = job.course_id and student_course.student_id = #{studentId} and job.course_id = course.course_id and (course_name like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or job_title like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')) order by isStarted ASC,isEnded ASC, job_end_time DESC, job_title + 0 ASC, course_name + 0 ASC,job_id ASC limit #{cur} ,10;

select job_title, job_id, DATE_FORMAT(job_begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as jobBeginTime, CEILING((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(job_end_time) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(job_begin_time)) / 60 / 60 / 24) as time, course_name, (job_end_time < now()) as isEnded, (job_begin_time < now()) as isStarted from job, course where course.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and job.course_id = course.course_id and (course_name like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%') or job_title like concat(concat('%', #{keyword}), '%')) order by isStarted ASC,isEnded ASC, job_end_time DESC, job_title + 0 ASC, course_name + 0 ASC,job_id ASC limit #{cur} ,10;

select job_title, job_id, DATE_FORMAT(job_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as jobEndTime, DATE_FORMAT(job_begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as jobBeginTime, job_content, course_id, (job_end_time < now()) as isEnded from job where job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into job(job_title, job_content, job_begin_time, job_end_time, course_id) value (#{jobTitle}, #{jobContent}, #{jobBeginTime}, #{jobEndTime}, #{courseId})
mapper.select: select course.course_id as courseId, job_title as jobTitle, course_name as courseName, academic_year as academicYear, semester from job, course where job.course_id = course.course_id and job_id = #{jobId}
